# European AR map
Map of antibiotic use, clinical _E. coli_ resistance profiles and antibiotc resistance genes detected in waste waters. Clinical data taken from ECDC and waste water data is produced using qPCR in StARe project published in Science Adcvances.   
The actual analyses and maps can be seen [here](http://karkman.github.io/StARe_map).
